name: Air Fryer Hard (or Soft) Boiled Eggs
instructions: Heat air fryer to 275Â°F. Add eggs to the air fryer basket in a single layer. Cook for 10 minutes for soft-boiled eggs. For jammy eggs, cook 12. For hard-boiled eggs, cook for 15 minutes. Carefully remove eggs from the air fryer into an ice water bath. Rest in the water bath for 3-5 minutes then peel and enjoy!
